attributes.action: Increase the minimum wage annually accordingly to GDP growth FOR EVERYONE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Prime Minister, GDP is growing quickly, 2006 yearly GDP growth was 3%. Please therefore increase the minimum wage (both for under-22s and for those who are 22 or older) by 3%, and increase the minimum wage annually accordingly to GDP growth, that is, by the same percentage by which percentage GDP grew the previous year.
